https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2in3p9uaX6ClqkMS8Oci69LCsXP.jpg 1998, Nalchik. A Jewish family is in trouble: the youngest son and his bride do not come home, and in the morning, a ransom note arrives. The ransom is so high that the family is forced not only to sell its small business, but also to seek help from its fellow tribesmen. Closeness
